node.title: I plan to spend New Years Day:
node.author: apl

data.field: unconscious (alone) unconscious (with one or more individuals) programming (one day is like any other) still partying (it's a week-end, after all) trying something new (e-mail me; I'll try anything twice) trying something old (music, TV, reading) with friends with family watching football what's this fixation with January 1st? New Years falls on ([http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rosh_Hashanah|Rosh Hashanah],[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/T%E1%BA%BFt|Tet], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diwali|Diwali], etc. ) other
